name: Balloon Popper (TLDGames)
description:
Balloon Popper was a game that i challenge myself to make in 48 hours. It s very simple premise. Pop The Balloon and up your score.

But be aware there a green neon balloon that will subtract points if popped.

For an Advantage in Points try to match the color of the bar with the balloon you pop in the time it active to receive double the points. If you Reach 0 or the time runs out the game is over.
